did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Westmoreland(Va.) Justice of the Peace Records, 1886-1934

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Westmoreland (Va.) Justice of the Peace Records, 1886 - 1934. Local government records collection , Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Westmoreland Va.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Westmoreland County was named for the English county. It was formed from Northumberland County in 1653, and part of King George County was added in 1777. Its area is 229 square miles, and the county seat is Montross.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Westmoreland County (Va.) Justice of the Peace Records includes the following series; Cases Disposed of by the Justices and Justices' Executions.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Westmoreland County Justice of the Peace Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm
